decision_conditions: The proposed retention of the front metal fence creates a prominent and visually intrusive feature, contrary to the established character of the street scene locally. The proposed retention of the works are considered to conflict with the implementation of Policy DC61 of the London Borough of Havering LDF Core Strategy and Development Control Policies DPD 2008 and the adopted London Borough of Havering Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2011.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason for it was given to Applicant/Agent.
description: Retrospective planning permission for 1.8m high metal fence and gate around front part of driveway.
